Module ReservationService
Package pl.polsl.lab.model

Class PatientsList

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab.model.PatientsList
public class PatientsList
extends java.lang.Object
Represents model structure of MVC, which contains list of registered patients, loaded from file used with serialization.
Version:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Patient> patients
    List of registered patients.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientsList

      public PatientsList()
      Default constructor.

    • PatientsList

      public PatientsList​(java.lang.String dbPath)
      Constructor deserialise data from file passed by console arguments.
      Parameters:
      dbPath - path to data base file. If its null, array will be also null.

  • Method Details

    • nameValidation

      private boolean nameValidation​(java.lang.String name)
      Method used to check if name contains only letters and spaces.
      Parameters:
      name - String parameter to validate
      Returns:
      true or false, depends on .matches method

    • phoneNumValidation

      private boolean phoneNumValidation​(java.lang.String phoneNum)
      Method used to check if phone number contains only decimals and a plus (when +48 or some else)
      Parameters:
      phoneNum - String parameter to validate
      Returns:
      true or false, depends on .matches method

    • peselValidation

      private boolean peselValidation​(java.lang.String pesel)
      Method used to check if PESEL contains only decimals, has length of 11, and also fulfills checking algorithm.
      Parameters:
      pesel - String parameter to validate
      Returns:
      true or false, depends on .matches method

    • getNewId

      private java.lang.Integer getNewId()
      Method used to return id for new user.
      Returns:
      returns id for new user.

    • getChosenPatients

      public java.util.List<Patient> getChosenPatients​(Doctor doctor)
      Method that returns list of chosen patients by doctor type
      Parameters:
      doctor - doctor type
      Returns:
      list which contains patients

    • getPatientsCount

      public int getPatientsCount​(Doctor doctor)
      Method that returns number of patients of the chosen doctor
      Parameters:
      doctor - chosen doctor
      Returns:
      number of patients assigned to doctor

    • addPatient

      public java.lang.Integer addPatient​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String pesel, java.lang.String phoneNumber, Doctor doctor) throws PatientParamsException
      Method used to add new patient into list. Method can throw an exception which informs user which parameter is in wrong format.
      Parameters:
      name - name of new user.
      lastName - last name of user.
      pesel - PESEL of user.
      phoneNumber - phone number of user.
      doctor - doctor to whom the patient is registerd
      Returns:
      method returns id of new added user for controller, to pass it into view to print it for user.
      Throws:
      PatientParamsException - exception which informs user which parameter (name/last name/PESEL/phone number) was wrong.

    • getInfoById

      public Patient getInfoById​(int _id)
      Method used to return patient from list to controller for print its data (name/last name/PESEL/phone number) on the console.
      Parameters:
      _id - id of wanted user
      Returns:
      Patient object

    • saveModelData

      public void saveModelData​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Method used to serialize data to data base file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to data base file. If its null, data will not be saved.
